install.name: Random Quote
install.author: HUBzero
install.description: Module to display random featured quote

param.name: moduleid
param.label: Module ID
param.description: An ID to be applied to the css of the module container, this allows individual module styling

param.name: quotepool
param.label: Quotes Pool
param.description: Select which quotes to pull from

param.name: show_author
param.label: Show author name
param.description: Select whether to show author name

param.name: show_all_link
param.label: Show link to all quotes
param.description: Select whether to show link to all quotes

param.name: quotesrc
param.label: Quote source
param.description: Select whether to show data from miniquote or short quote column

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is re-cached
